name: Artifact of The Greedy
description:
Created for the "Themed Horror Game Jam #3", the theme of the jam was Price of Greed. 

You play as a treasure hunter that explores a temple, which holds a dark secrete for those who are greedy.

Controls

WASD : Walk/Boat Paddle

Mouse : Look

Left Shift : Sprint

Spacebar : Jump

E : Interact

Left mouse : Attack
